name: MadMansion
description:
You play as an aspiring Vlogger and explore an old abandoned, but still in-tact Victorian Mansion! Explore and tackle the puzzles and challenges that lie ahead and uncover the secrets this Mansion has to offer.

After finishing this game, we would really appreciate it if you were to fill out this questionnaire and provide us some valuable feedback which we can use to make the game better!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeyUgdFkh1ul4fx62g_XDoqYtz5ESgtU29icKDbJHSh4zCu8w/viewform
